plot outline: Embedded with fierce action and intense emotion, this family-oriented socio-political drama delves into the twists and turns in the family of Harischandra Prasad (Nandamuri Balakrishna), an influential leader in Rayalaseema, who is dedicated towards uplifting the people. Automatically, he develops enemies who plan to kill him and destroy his family in the process. They turn Prasad's grandson, Bobby who is nothing more than a child, into a professional killer and have him murder his own grandfather. When Bobby grows up, he comes to know the truth about his family background and returns to join hands with his father and set right past injustice. Will he succeed in his task?
title: Adhinayakudu
plot: A Grandson from a political family struggles to level up with his father and grandfather. Balakrishna plays all three roles in this film.

Embedded with fierce action and intense emotion, this family-oriented socio-political drama delves into the twists and turns in the family of Harischandra Prasad (Nandamuri Balakrishna), an influential leader in Rayalaseema, who is dedicated towards uplifting the people. Automatically, he develops enemies who plan to kill him and destroy his family in the process. They turn Prasad's grandson, Bobby who is nothing more than a child, into a professional killer and have him murder his own grandfather. When Bobby grows up, he comes to know the truth about his family background and returns to join hands with his father and set right past injustice. Will he succeed in his task?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
